promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive legendary horse grass-type pokemon wearing a green and brown crystal headband. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or horse. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Emeraldequine, a a massive legendary horse grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Tough Hammer, Wind Blast. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "horse", "grass" or "Emeraldequine". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, horse-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This verdant equine deity shapes forests with Tough Hammer, and whispers through trees with Wind Blast. A sylvan legend.
